for claudius

*she is his link but to Augustus and the Julio line..he is a claudian purely..now with teh marriage to agrippina he can borrow some of teh glory of Augustus

*he gets some one who id wise with finances and skilled at running a household..and she has no of teh same vices as melissilina which made him a laughing stock!

haah well for nero, she influenced his love life...tactitus quite clearly states she forced him to give up lovers...taht about all i can think of in specifics right now..lol..ill go home and make agripiina notes a priority for u guys!
